document_data.name: Roge Applewink
document_data.mainbody: '''Roge Applewink''' was a large [[halfling]] farmer in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|7}}
document_data.Activities: Roge regularly sold his products to [[Reyill Werned]].
document_data.History:
His partnership with Reyill had been very good for Roge's businesses over the years.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Roge was drinking with his [[halfling]] friends and Reyill at the [[Plodding Plow]], in the village of [[the Stop]].
document_data.Relationship: Roge was friends with [[Narder Ulthub]] and [[Guylian Stundter]]. He had good dealings with Reyill Werned.
